text.description:
{Amulet of the Undead}

Wearing the Amulet of the Undead can increase your Necromancy skill by 2.5%.

{Cloak of the Undead King}

The Necromancy skill is enhanced by 15%. In addition, the higher the level of Necromancy, the higher the level of the undead summoned. Elementary level: Zombies. Intermediate level: Ghosts. Advanced level: Liches.

{Boots of the Death God}

Wearing the Boots of the Death God can increase your Necromancy skill by 7.5%.

{Vampire Cape}

Wearing the Vampire Cape can increase your Necromancy skill by 5%.
